verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> one be found <S%H4672><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, lying <S%H5307><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and it be not <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> hath slain <S%H5221><s%> him:

Then thy elders <S%H2205><s%> and thy judges <S%H8199><s%> shall come forth, <S%H3318><s%> and they shall measure <S%H4058><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> him that is slain: <S%H2491><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that the city <S%H5892><s%> which is next <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the slain man, <S%H2491><s%> even the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> a heifer, <S%H5697><s%> <S%H1241><s%> which <S%H834><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> been wrought <S%H5647><s%> with, and which <S%H834><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> drawn <S%H4900><s%> in the yoke; <S%H5923><s%>

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heifer <S%H5697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> a rough <S%H386><s%> valley, <S%H5158><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is neither <S%H3808><s%> eared <S%H5647><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> sown, <S%H2232><s%> and shall strike off <S%H6203><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heifer's <S%H5697><s%> neck <S%H6203><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the valley: <S%H5158><s%>

And the priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> shall come near; <S%H5066><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> them the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto him, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and by <S%H5921><s%> their word <S%H6310><s%> shall every <S%H3605><s%> controversy <S%H7379><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> stroke <S%H5061><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> tried:

And all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> that are next <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%> man, shall wash <S%H7364><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the heifer <S%H5697><s%> that is beheaded <S%H6202><s%> in the valley: <S%H5158><s%>

And they shall answer <S%H6030><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Our hands <S%H3027><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have our eyes <S%H5869><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> it.

Be merciful, <S%H3722><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> unto thy people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou hast redeemed, <S%H6299><s%> and lay <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H408><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> unto thy people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel's <S%H3478><s%> charge. <S%H7130><s%> And the blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be forgiven <S%H3722><s%> them.

So shalt thou <S%H859><s%> put away <S%H1197><s%> the guilt of innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> you, when <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou goest forth <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into thine hands, <S%H3027><s%> and thou hast taken <S%H7617><s%> them captive, <S%H7628><s%>

And seest <S%H7200><s%> among the captives <S%H7633><s%> a beautiful <S%H3033><s%> <S%H8389><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> and hast a desire <S%H2836><s%> unto her, that thou wouldest have <S%H3947><s%> her to thy wife; <S%H802><s%>

Then thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> her home <S%H8432><s%> to thine house; <S%H1004><s%> and she shall shave <S%H1548><s%> <S%H853><s%> her head, <S%H7218><s%> and pare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> her nails; <S%H6856><s%>

And she shall put <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> the raiment <S%H8071><s%> of her captivity <S%H7628><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> her, and shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in thine house, <S%H1004><s%> and bewail <S%H1058><s%> <S%H853><s%> her father <S%H1><s%> and her mother <S%H517><s%> a full <S%H3117><s%> month: <S%H3391><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> that <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, and be her husband, <S%H1167><s%> and she shall be <S%H1961><s%> thy wife. <S%H802><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou have no delight <S%H2654><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in her, then thou shalt let her go <S%H7971><s%> whither she will; <S%H5315><s%> but thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> sell her at all <S%H4376><s%> <S%H4376><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> make merchandise <S%H6014><s%> of her, because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast humbled <S%H6031><s%> her.

If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> one <S%H259><s%> beloved, <S%H157><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> hated, <S%H8130><s%> and they have born <S%H3205><s%> him children, <S%H1121><s%> both the beloved <S%H157><s%> and the hated; <S%H8130><s%> and if the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> hers that was hated: <S%H8146><s%>

Then it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3117><s%> he maketh <S%H853><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> he hath, <S%H1961><s%> that he may <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H1069><s%> <S%H853><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the beloved <S%H157><s%> firstborn <S%H1069><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the hated, <S%H8130><s%> which is indeed the firstborn: <S%H1060><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> he shall acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H853><s%> for the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> by giving <S%H5414><s%> him a double <S%H8147><s%> portion <S%H6310><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath: <S%H4672><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his strength; <S%H202><s%> the right <S%H4941><s%> of the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> is his.

If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> a stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious <S%H4784><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> which will not <S%H369><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> or the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his mother, <S%H517><s%> and that, when they have chastened <S%H3256><s%> him, will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them:

Then shall his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him, and bring him out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city, <S%H5892><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of his place; <S%H4725><s%>

And they shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city, <S%H5892><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> our son <S%H1121><s%> is stubborn <S%H5637><s%> and rebellious, <S%H4784><s%> he will not <S%H369><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> our voice; <S%H6963><s%> he is a glutton, <S%H2151><s%> and a drunkard. <S%H5433><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones, <S%H68><s%> that he die: <S%H4191><s%> so shalt thou put evil away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H7451><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> you; and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear. <S%H3372><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> have committed <S%H1961><s%> a sin <S%H2399><s%> worthy <S%H4941><s%> of death, <S%H4194><s%> and he be to be put to death, <S%H4191><s%> and thou hang <S%H8518><s%> him on <S%H5921><s%> a tree: <S%H6086><s%>

His body <S%H5038><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> remain all night <S%H3885><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the tree, <S%H6086><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt in any wise bury <S%H6912><s%> <S%H6912><s%> him that <S%H1931><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> (for <S%H3588><s%> he that is hanged <S%H8518><s%> is accursed <S%H7045><s%> of God;) <S%H430><s%> that <S%H853><s%> thy land <S%H127><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> defiled, <S%H2930><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee for an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
